description: Voice cards with sample playback, filters by language/style, provider badges, quality indicators

description: Install and configure Playwright for end-to-end tests
notes: Script already in package.json: pnpm test:e2e. Tests go in tests/e2e/ directory.

title: Create app pages structure
notes: Pages per FRONTEND_DESIGN.md: / (landing), /dashboard, /generate, /generations, /generations/[id], /voices, /settings, /api-docs. Use App Router file-based routing.

title: Build TextInput component
description: TextArea with character count, file upload (txt, docx, pdf), language auto-detection badge
notes: Located in src/components/TextInput/. Features: textarea with char count, file upload (txt/docx/pdf), language auto-detection badge, content type indicator.

title: Set up shadcn/ui
description: Initialize shadcn/ui component library with Tailwind integration
notes: Use shadcn/ui with Tailwind 4. Component library for consistent UI. Will need to run shadcn init after core deps installed.

title: Add core dependencies
description: Install TanStack Query, Zustand, React Hook Form, Zod for state management and forms
notes: Hybrid state approach: TanStack Query for server state (API data), Zustand for client state (UI preferences). Also need: react-hook-form + zod for forms.

title: Build GenerationStatus component
description: Progress bar, current step indicator, estimated time remaining, real-time updates via SignalR
notes: Shows real-time progress during audio generation. Connects to SignalR hub. Updates React Query cache on events. Pattern from FRONTEND_DESIGN.md section 6.2.

title: Add SignalR client for real-time updates
description: Install @microsoft/signalr and create GenerationHub client for live progress updates
notes: Package: @microsoft/signalr. Hub endpoint: /hubs/generation. Events: StatusUpdate, Progress, Completed, Failed. Integrate with React Query cache for seamless updates.

title: Create Zustand stores
description: Create uiStore for client state: selectedVoice, routingStrategy, isGenerating
notes: Create src/stores/uiStore.ts. State: selectedVoice, routingStrategy (cost|quality|speed|balanced), isGenerating. Pattern from FRONTEND_DESIGN.md section 4.2.

title: Build CostEstimate component
description: Provider options comparison, quality vs cost visualization, credits remaining display
notes: Located in src/components/CostEstimate/. Features: provider comparison table, quality vs cost visualization, credits remaining display. Uses routing strategy from uiStore.

title: Set up git remote and push initial commit
notes: Remote: git@github.com:waner11/voiceprocessor-web.git. Git identity configured locally (not global): Waner Pena <wanerpena@gmail.com>

notes: Create in src/hooks/. Hooks: useGenerations, useGeneration (with auto-refetch when processing), useCreateGeneration, useVoices, useUsage. Pattern from FRONTEND_DESIGN.md section 4.1.

title: Set up API client with openapi-typescript

notes: Install openapi-typescript + openapi-fetch. Backend OpenAPI spec at http://localhost:5000/swagger/v1/swagger.json (when running). Script already in package.json: pnpm generate:api --spec=URL

description: Create directories: src/components, src/features, src/hooks, src/lib, src/stores, src/types per architecture docs
notes: Structure from FRONTEND_DESIGN.md. Empty dirs already exist (src/, tests/, public/) but need: components/, features/, hooks/, lib/, stores/, types/ under src/
